nodes.text: The Wooded Valley was located south of Castle Organa on the Apalis Coast of the planet Alderaan, and was the site of the main roadway between the House Organa estate and the Alsakan Lowlands to the east. During the Alderaan Civil War, the trees in the northern part of the valley were cut down, leading to that section becoming known as the Deforested Slopes. The Spears of Organa were located in the valley.
